DHA find cell body especially high nerve cell brain eye . Babies get DHA mother 're womb . After birth , get DHA breast milk infant formula . This study enroll pregnant woman follow baby baby 12 month old . Changes development baby track . Half participant study receive 200mg DHA take daily . The half participant receive 800mg DHA take daily . Participants , along researcher , know dose DHA receiving .
